turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, what can i do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order pizzas from Bella Luna Pizzeria, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what would you like from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like four pizzas all four of them small over extra cheese one pizza can I get a cheese burger pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second, can I get a barbecue chicken pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The third, can I get a Hawaiian pizza with Canadian bacon?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, i'm not familiar with cheeseburger pizza and don't see it on the menu. what was in that one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a meat lover's pizza instead, then?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so you want 4 small pizzas with extra cheese, 1 meat lovers, 1 bbq chicken, 1 hawaiian with canadian bacon, and 1 with mushrooms, olives, and mozzarella cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $40.45 is the total. did you want me to place the order for pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted the order. it'll be ready for you in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you very much for your help. I really appreciate it.
